casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Montrez Demario CARTER. No. 290A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 1, 2006. George E. Kelly, III, Palmyra, VA, for Montrez Demario Carter. Michael Nifong, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of June 2006 by the Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of June 2006."
